gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.ext
Interface User<A>

Type Parameters:
A - Type of authorization identifier.
All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
MockUser
public interface User<A>
extends Serializable

Common interface for the user of an application.

Method Summary

 boolean isAuthorized(A authorizationId)
          Checks if this user is authorized for the action that is controlled by an authorization control identified with the authorizationId.
 

Method Detail

isAuthorized

boolean isAuthorized(A authorizationId)
Checks if this user is authorized for the action that is controlled by an authorization control identified with the authorizationId.

Parameters:
authorizationId - Id of the authorization controlling the action.
Returns:
Returns true if the user is authorized for the action controlled by the specified is action.

getAuthorizationToken

String getAuthorizationToken(A authorizationId)
Gets the authorization token for the specified authorization id. The authorization token is the value specified for the specific authorization id. This method returns the String representation of this value.

Parameters:
authorizationId - Id of the authorization controlling the action.
Returns:
Returns the authorization token of this authorization id.

authorizationDescription

String authorizationDescription(A authorizationId)
Gets the description of the user's authorization that is defined by the specified authorization id.

Parameters:
authorizationId - Id of the authorization controlling the action.
Returns:
Returns the description that matches to the authorization of this user for the specified authorization id.

getUserId

String getUserId()
UserID of this user.

Returns:
Returns the userID of this user.

getUserName

String getUserName()
Gets the user name.

Returns:
Returns the name of the user.

getUserPassword

String getUserPassword()
Gets the user password.

Returns:
Returns the password of the user.

getEmailAddress

String getEmailAddress()
Gets the email address of the user.

Returns:
Returns the email address of the user.
